text: 9.24: Ro 8.34; Hi 6.20; 8.2; 1 Zo 2.1Nza kaŋgi, Krais ana gumgi wari won farir Fhe Bakɨme Phen tuma panpana vhuav muuŋgi Phena vhen vergi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana nduara Hevenra vergi. Ana nza nzuav Hevenan Fhe Bakɨme nɨman vergi. Ana ntigem Fhe Bakɨme han Hevenan kav, ana ntigem nzan kurkurigi.
